an3.63:3.9.pli: Yāni tāni, bho gotama, uccāsayanamahāsayanāni, seyyathidaṁ—
an3.63:3.9.en: Surely Mister Gotama gets when he wants, without trouble or difficulty, various kinds of high and luxurious bedding, such as:

an3.63:4.1.pli: “Yāni kho pana tāni, brāhmaṇa, uccāsayanamahāsayanāni, seyyathidaṁ—
an3.63:4.1.en: “Brahmin, these various kinds of high and luxurious bedding

an3.63:5.1.pli: Tīṇi kho, imāni, brāhmaṇa, uccāsayanamahāsayanāni, yesāhaṁ etarahi nikāmalābhī akicchalābhī akasiralābhī.
an3.63:5.1.en: There are, brahmin, these three high and luxurious beds that I get these days when I want, without trouble or difficulty.

an3.63:5.3.pli: Dibbaṁ uccāsayanamahāsayanaṁ, brahmaṁ uccāsayanamahāsayanaṁ, ariyaṁ uccāsayanamahāsayanaṁ.
an3.63:5.3.en: The heavenly high and luxurious bed, the divine high and luxurious bed, and the noble high and luxurious bed.

an3.63:5.4.pli: Imāni kho, brāhmaṇa, tīṇi uccāsayanamahāsayanāni, yesāhaṁ etarahi nikāmalābhī akicchalābhī akasiralābhī”ti.
an3.63:5.4.en: These are the three high and luxurious beds that I get these days when I want, without trouble or difficulty.”

an3.63:6.1.pli: “Katamaṁ pana taṁ, bho gotama, dibbaṁ uccāsayanamahāsayanaṁ, yassa bhavaṁ gotamo etarahi nikāmalābhī akicchalābhī akasiralābhī”ti?
an3.63:6.1.en: “But what, Mister Gotama, is the heavenly high and luxurious bed?”

an3.63:6.13.pli: Idaṁ kho, brāhmaṇa, dibbaṁ uccāsayanamahāsayanaṁ, yassāhaṁ etarahi nikāmalābhī akicchalābhī akasiralābhī”ti.
an3.63:6.13.en: This is the heavenly high and luxurious bed that I get these days when I want, without trouble or difficulty.”

an3.63:7.2.pli: Ko cañño evarūpassa dibbassa uccāsayanamahāsayanassa nikāmalābhī bhavissati akicchalābhī akasiralābhī, aññatra bhotā gotamena.
an3.63:7.2.en: Who but Mister Gotama could get such a heavenly high and luxurious bed when he wants, without trouble or difficulty?

an3.63:8.1.pli: Katamaṁ pana taṁ, bho gotama, brahmaṁ uccāsayanamahāsayanaṁ, yassa bhavaṁ gotamo etarahi nikāmalābhī akicchalābhī akasiralābhī”ti?
an3.63:8.1.en: But what, Mister Gotama, is the divine high and luxurious bed?”

an3.63:8.13.pli: Idaṁ kho, brāhmaṇa, brahmaṁ uccāsayanamahāsayanaṁ, yassāhaṁ etarahi nikāmalābhī akicchalābhī akasiralābhī”ti.
an3.63:8.13.en: This is the divine high and luxurious bed that I get these days when I want, without trouble or difficulty.”

an3.63:9.2.pli: Ko cañño evarūpassa brahmassa uccāsayanamahāsayanassa nikāmalābhī bhavissati akicchalābhī akasiralābhī, aññatra bhotā gotamena.
an3.63:9.2.en: Who but Mister Gotama could get such a divine high and luxurious bed when he wants, without trouble or difficulty?

an3.63:10.1.pli: Katamaṁ pana taṁ, bho gotama, ariyaṁ uccāsayanamahāsayanaṁ, yassa bhavaṁ gotamo etarahi nikāmalābhī akicchalābhī akasiralābhī”ti?
an3.63:10.1.en: “But what, Mister Gotama, is the noble high and luxurious bed?”

an3.63:10.13.pli: Idaṁ kho, brāhmaṇa, ariyaṁ uccāsayanamahāsayanaṁ, yassāhaṁ etarahi nikāmalābhī akicchalābhī akasiralābhī”ti.
an3.63:10.13.en: This is the noble high and luxurious bed that I get these days when I want, without trouble or difficulty.”

an3.63:11.2.pli: Ko cañño evarūpassa ariyassa uccāsayanamahāsayanassa nikāmalābhī bhavissati akicchalābhī akasiralābhī, aññatra bhotā gotamena.
an3.63:11.2.en: Who but Mister Gotama could get such a noble high and luxurious bed when he wants, without trouble or difficulty?

mlDocs.title:
Numbered Discourses 3.63
7. The Great Chapter
At Venāgapura

an9.18:2.1.pli: ‘Yāvajīvaṁ arahanto uccāsayanamahāsayanaṁ pahāya uccāsayanamahāsayanā paṭiviratā nīcaseyyaṁ kappenti—mañcake vā tiṇasanthārake vā;
an9.18:2.1.en: ‘As long as they live, the perfected ones give up high and luxurious beds. They sleep in a low place, either a small bed or a straw mat.

an9.18:2.2.pli: ahampajja imañca rattiṁ imañca divasaṁ uccāsayanamahāsayanaṁ pahāya uccāsayanamahāsayanā paṭivirato nīcaseyyaṁ kappemi—mañcake vā tiṇasanthārake vā.
an9.18:2.2.en: I, too, for this day and night will give up high and luxurious beds. I’ll sleep in a low place, either a small bed or a straw mat.

Sabbath

dn1:1.10.6.en: ‘He refrains from high and luxurious beds.’

dn1:1.15.1.pli: ‘Yathā vā paneke bhonto samaṇabrāhmaṇā saddhādeyyāni bhojanāni bhuñjitvā te evarūpaṁ uccāsayanamahāsayanaṁ anuyuttā viharanti,
dn1:1.15.1.en: ‘There are some ascetics and brahmins who, while enjoying food given in faith, still make use of high and luxurious bedding.

dn2:45.5.en: They refrain from high and luxurious beds.

sn56.82:1.1.pli: … “Evameva kho, bhikkhave, appakā te sattā ye uccāsayanamahāsayanā paṭiviratā; atha kho eteva bahutarā sattā ye uccāsayanamahāsayanā appaṭiviratā …pe….
sn56.82:1.1.en: “… the sentient beings who refrain from high and luxurious beds are few, while those who don’t refrain are many. …”
